memberdef.name: SpinSliderEvent
memberdef.initializer: EVT_SLIDER(ID_ ## n, EffectReverb::On ## n ## Slider) \ EVT_TEXT(ID_ ## n, EffectReverb::On ## n ## Text)

memberdef.name: SpinSlider
memberdef.initializer: m ## n ## T = S.Id(ID_ ## n). \ AddSpinCtrl( p, DEF_ ## n, MAX_ ## n, MIN_ ## n); \ S.SetStyle(wxSL_HORIZONTAL); \ m ## n ## S = S.Id(ID_ ## n). \ AddSlider(wxT(""), DEF_ ## n, MAX_ ## n, MIN_ ## n);

memberdef.name: SetSpinSlider
memberdef.initializer: m ## n ## S->SetValue((int) mParams.m ## n); \ m ## n ## T->SetValue(wxString::Format(wxT("%d"), (int) mParams.m ## n));

memberdef.name: SpinSliderHandlers
memberdef.initializer: void EffectReverb::On ## n ## Slider(wxCommandEvent & evt) \ { \ if (mProcessingEvent) return; \ mProcessingEvent = true; \ m ## n ## T->SetValue(wxString::Format(wxT("%d"), evt.GetInt())); \ mProcessingEvent = false; \ } \ void EffectReverb::On ## n ## Text(wxCommandEvent & evt) \ { \ if (mProcessingEvent) return; \ mProcessingEvent = true; \ m ## n ## S->SetValue(TrapLong(evt.GetInt(), MIN_ ## n, MAX_ ## n)); \ mProcessingEvent = false; \ }
